name: Åsa Sjöberg
background: Oversees factual and entertainment commissioning; seeks mass appeal, emotional resonance, relatable characters and accessible formats for Swedish mainstream audiences.
thematic_priorities: Family, health and social issue documentaries
Crime and justice series with unique access
content_not_wanted: Overly experimental projects with limited scalability
target_audience: Core 25–54 viewers with family and lifestyle interest
format_specifications: Series formats; feature-length singles where impactful
technical_requirements: Content adaptable for TV4 linear and streaming
current_calls: Crime with exclusive access or new perspective
submission_process: One-pager or deck with premise, emotional hooks and format
Viewer appeal and time slot suggestion
Submit via TV4 commissioning or trusted producers
